description: Shows like new. Quality-built, 1,308 sf, 2-level, freshly renovated townhome in convenient west Cambie. Brand new: Euro-style kitchen (new fridge & slightly used range), 2.5 bathrooms, paint, plumbing/lighting fixtures, & flooring (designer laminate wood up and down + tiled kitchen & bath floors). Gas fireplace & radiant, hot water, in-floor heating on main. 3 large bedrooms upstairs. Primary bedroom has walk-in closet & 3pc ensuite bath. Single garage (10’ x 18’8”) + second, reserved parking spot beside. 20’ x 18’ (360’ sf) private yard, featuring 12’ x 12’ patio, facing quiet Kilby Dr for easy additional street parking. Max 1 cat or dog.
